review: Looks like doctor is in a hurry to deal with all patients as she came late to clinic.She donâ€™t have patience to listen to details instead prescribing lot of tabs

I had visited the hospital and met the doctor. Consultation experience was not good with the doctor and it was not professional. She was not friendly as well. I had some issues to show to lady doctor, she didn't even dare to close door. She was rude in terms of listening to problem. Even dressing was done by the nurse and she didn't care. I had a wound and she was making faces. Antibiotics were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital.
